Narratives.Body:
Jack and Jill went up the hill
to fetch a pail of water

Decisions.Body: Fall down on your face because you suck.
Walk like a person because you don't suck.

Narratives.Body:
Jack fell down and broke his crown
and Jill came tumbling after

Decisions.Body: Get back up and run home crying.
Get back up and get more water.

Narratives.Body:
Jack got up, and home did trot
As fast as he could caper
To old Dame Dob, who patched his nob
With vinegar and brown paper
You lie there like a bitch.
